column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The best deep dish pizza in Chicago
column2: period. I don't care what they tell the tourists about Giordano's but I've grown up with Lou's and it never disappoints. It is technically "Pan" pizza but it has thick layers of cheese and tomatoes (not just tomato sauce). The salads and other dishes are great as well but the pizza is the star. Also
column3: for those of you cutting carbs
column4: I recommend the "meat-za" which is a layer of sausage with all the pizza toppings
